description
================
TimeSplitters : Future Perfect ? This third edition of one of the most innovative games on consoles FPP . In the fight apparitions with a first person perspective , players lead fight for their past , present and future.

The world presented in the game is on the brink of extinction. Suddenly , to wreak total destruction appeared sinister figures called TimeSplitters . The main character of the game is already known from previous parts Cortez . The player takes the role of his character , to experience an incredible journey back in time and learn the origin of the TimeSplitters . Only in this way can save the world.

The game is set in different periods and locations important to the history of mankind. Events taking place in the range of 1914 to 2401 years . Each period is quite different weapons , gadgets , enemies and surroundings. In addition, the innovative possibility of time travel allows the paradoxes , the effect of which will be meeting a player from his own native form of past or future version . In this way, players have the opportunity to correct errors they have committed and reality merge into one.

* New weapons and gadgets - about 20 types of weapons including rifles , rocket launchers and gravity gun allows you to use the elements of the environment as projectiles (such as characters, vehicles and different objects ) .
* In Story Mode , you can experience the whole story in conjunction with another player with the option of co-operation ;
* Arcade mode allows you to explore different mini-games , add-ons and special maps prepared by the authors ;
* Challenge mode allows players to compete with each other. To unlock a number of special items that can brag in front of friends ;
* Playing multiplayer gameplay at the same time allows for 16 players from around the world . Version for Sony PlayStation 2 support in the Network Adaptor to technology ;
* Improved map editor with the new interface allows players to more easily create your own maps and share them on the network;
* The game presents even more lifelike environments , spectacular effects , high quality animated cut scenes , the game world physics and enhanced artificial intelligence opponents.
